text: 20|121|annane avar (adamum bharyayum) a vrksattil ninn bhaksiccu. appeal avar iruvarkkum tannalute guhyabhagannal velippetukayum, svargattile ilakal kutticertt tannalute deham avar peatiyan tutannukayum ceytu. adam tanre raksitavineat anusaranakket kanikkukayum, annane pilacc peakukayum ceytu
